title: Graham And Green UMBERTO BRASS CABINET
description: UMBERTO BRASS CABINET  Hand-finished with a brass sheet wrap on a mango wood frame, our deco-inspired Umberto brass cabinet has ample space to keep all your treasured possessions hidden in style.   Dimensions:H76 x W76 x D40cm.  Fixed shelf: H28cm.   Features a hole for cables in the right hand corner.  Made from mango wood, iron and brass.  Legs and handles made from lacquered brass-plated iron.  Some simple self-assembly is required to attach the legs.  This product has been cladded with a brass sheet over a wood frame.   We recommend periodically cleaning with a brass cleaning kit.  Please note that cleaning will not prevent metal tarnishing, the colour and finish will change however this piece can be moderately restored to its original state.  To prevent watermarks and heat damage, never place items such as ceramics, tableware or glassware directly onto the surface of any of our wooden furniture without the protection of a heat resistant mat, coaster or trivet. Clean up any spillages immediately to avoid staining.  This product is handmade from natural materials so the exact colour and finish will vary.   Pre-owned excellent condition, there is a slight bit of movement on the wood top left at the back, hardly noticeable, see last image. This is due to the natural mango wood that can expand in different environments.

title: Mille Nuits Wall Sconce By Barrarat RRP £7,500 Each
description: Sophisticated and super luxurious show stopping lead crystal wall light (single)   DESCRIPTION  Ornamental beads in prismatic hexagonal shapes, amongst them Baccarat signature’s single red crystal, hang resplendently and richly refract the light. The shape Mille Nuits unit further highlights the crystal’s exceptional light-scattering properties.  Composed of bevel-cut crystal shades and gilded arms with curled and curved contours, it glimmers radiantly. Hanging arrowhead-shaped ornamental crystal droplets resplendently and richly refract the light. Baccarat signature’s single red crystal is a discreet yet striking presence amidst the luminous display.The snaking shape Mille Nuits unit further highlights the exceptional light-scattering properties of the crystal.  Mille Nuits is a reference to the 1001 Tales of The Arabian Nights.  Designed by Mathias for Baccarat, the collection also extends to stemware and home décor, which can be purchased from the Baccarat website.   Condition:As New in condition   Quantity:One for sale in this description but I have an identical one for sale. Ask if you require a pair,   Available:2   There are three of the wall lights available, this advertisement is for one.
